troubleshooting.title: Mic Test Online Troubleshooting Guide
troubleshooting.intro: Common microphone test online issues and solutions to get your mic working perfectly with our online mic test tool.

commonIssues.solution: Check if your microphone is connected and not muted. Ensure you've granted microphone permissions to your browser for our mic test online tool. Try refreshing the page and testing again with our microphone test online system.

Click the microphone icon in your browser's address bar to allow access for our mic test online tool. Some browsers require you to manually enable microphone permissions for the microphone test online to work properly.

Increase your microphone volume in system settings or check your microphone's physical volume controls. Our mic test online tool will show improved levels once you adjust your microphone test online settings properly.

Check your microphone connection and try moving closer to the microphone. Background noise can affect our mic test online results - try testing in a quieter environment for better microphone test online accuracy.
